definition: 10th earthly branch: 5-7 p.m., 8th solar month (8th September-7th October), year of the Rooster/ancient Chinese compass point: 270° (west)
phenolic aldehyde/phenolic resin (used to manufacture bakelite)
benzaldehyde C6H5CHO, the simplest aromatic aldehyde

sentences.english: The fatty acids are then converted by the organisms to an aldehyde that includes a carbon atom bonded to an oxygen atom (together they create what's called a carbonyl group).
sentences.chinese: 脂肪酸被生物體轉化成包含碳氧雙鍵即羰基的醛。

sentences.english: This paper reviewed the research progress in synthesis of citral in the recent years.
sentences.chinese: 文章綜述了近年來檸檬醛的合成研究進展。

sentences.english: A classical method to determine the content of cinnamaldehyde is called hydrochloride hydroxylamine—pyridine oximation.
sentences.chinese: 探討一種無吡啶鹽酸羥胺肟化法測定肉桂醛的可行性。

sentences.english: REDOX Relationships amongst Alcohols, Aldehydes and Ketones and Carboxylic acids.
sentences.chinese: 醇，醛與酮和羧酸之間的氧化還原關係。

sentences.english: Weinreb amide can easily be reduced to aldehyde by metal hydride.
sentences.chinese: Weinreb酰胺也易於被金屬氫化物還原爲醛。

sentences.english: It was used for catalytic oxidation of crotonic aldehyde to crotonic acid.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了巴豆醛催化氧化合成巴豆酸的研究進展。

sentences.english: The hydroxycitronellal has been synthesized from citronella oil .
sentences.chinese: 從香茅油出發合成了羥基香茅醛。

sentences.english: An HPLC method for determination of cinnamaldehyde in cassia bark capsules was developed.
sentences.chinese: 報道了桂皮膠囊中桂皮醛的高效液相色譜分析方法。

sentences.english: Ketones are very closely related to both aldehydes and alcohols.
sentences.chinese: 酮與醛和醇的關係都很密切。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a thin layer chromatography scanning method for the determination of cinnamaldehyde content in Qianzheng Plaster.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立牽正膏中桂皮醛含量的薄層掃描測定方法。

sentences.english: The expansive development prospect of cinnamaldehyde were viewed based on its wide application.
sentences.chinese: 肉桂醛的廣泛應用決定其具有十分廣闊的發展前景。

sentences.english: Chronic paraldehyde intoxication results in tolerance and dependence.
sentences.chinese: 慢性副醛中毒能導致耐受性和依賴性。

sentences.english: A rapid and simple method for the determination of cinnamaldehyde content in cassia was established.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種快速測定桂皮中桂皮醛含量的方法。

sentences.english: There are several examples of a one-carbon degradation leading to aldehydes.
sentences.chinese: 有一些減少一個碳原子製備醛的實例。

sentences.english: C is one of important glycolytic isozymes in the metabolic process.
sentences.chinese: 醛縮酶C是生命代謝過程中重要糖酵解同工酶之一。

sentences.english: The aldehyde solution was then cooled to 0℃ by an external ice bath.
sentences.chinese: 由外面的冰浴將這種醛的溶液冷卻到0℃。

definition: haloalkane (obtained from hydrocarbon by substituting halogen for hydrogen, e.g. chlorobenzene or the CFCs)
